questions.question: Compute the maximum deflection at free end of a cantilever beam subjected to udl for entire span of l metres
Calculate the maximum deflection of a cantilever beam with udl on entire span of 3m the intensity of you udl be 25 kN/m. Take EI as 4000 kN/m<sup>2</sup>
A cantilever is a beam whose

answers.a: Both ends are supported either on rollers or hinges
answers.c: One end is fixed and other end is free
answers.d: Whose both or one of the end has overhang

questions.question: In a cantilever subjected to a concentrated load (W) at the free end and having length =l, Maximum bending moment is

answers.a: Point where Shear force is maximum
answers.b: Point where Bending moment is maximum
answers.c: Point where Bending moment is zero
answers.d: Point where Bending moment=0 but also changes sign from positive to negative
